segments.text: I'm in a really good mood , actually . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: to be honest , I'm a bit fed up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , my boyfriend was supposed to call me last night , but he never did .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's too bad . I'm sure there's a logical explanation for it . Don't be too upset about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: the thing is , this isn't the first time he's promised to do something and then didn't .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see how that can get a bit annoying .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: a bit ? I'm extremely annoyed that he didn't phone me when he promised me that he would ! He's such a liar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: so what are you going to do about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I've got mixed feelings about it . On the one hand , I really want to end it with him , but on the other hand , I don't want to be without him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what do you think would make you happier ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: in the long run , I think breaking up with him would make me much happier , but I know that I'll be depressed about it for a few weeks first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what would you do if you were me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd call him and dump him now ! You deserve better than him !
segments.speaker: S2
